title: Whisky Parts Co. Spano Carbon Drop Handlebar uses a multi-stage flare for optimal angles
content:
Want a more comfortable grip on your gravel or all-road bike? Who doesn’t, right? Looking to offer a bar with more natural hand positions, Whisky just unveiled their latest bar, the Spano Progressive Flare Drop Bar. What does ‘progressive flare’ mean? Well, when it comes to bar flare, you usually have one of two options.

The post Whisky Parts Co. Spano Carbon Drop Handlebar uses a multi-stage flare for optimal angles appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
